com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.protocol.encoder

Class ProtocolEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.protocol.encoder.ProtocolEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IpmiEncoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Protocolv15Encoder, Protocolv20Encoder

    public abstract class ProtocolEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IpmiEncoder
    Adds IPMI session header to encrypted payload. Should be used to encode regular RMCP+ messages (excluding Open Session and RAKP Messages)
